Class ColorFrame

java.lang.Object
ColorFrame
public class ColorFrame
extends java.lang.Object
Colored reference frame to help align the 3D scenes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ColorFrame​(float size)
    Creates a reference frame with given size.

  • Method Summary

    • ColorFrame

      Creates a reference frame with given size.

  • Method Details

    • setColor

      public void setColor​(int axis, float r, float g, float b)
      Sets one axis color.
      Parameters:
      axis - Frame axis to paint (0, 1 or 2).
      r - Red component.
      g - Green component.
      b - Blue component.

    • setColor

      public void setColor​(char axis, float r, float g, float b)
      Sets one axis color.
      Parameters:
      axis - Frame axis to paint (x, y or z).
      r - Red component.
      g - Green component.
      b - Blue component.

      Parameters:
